description.lang: The SiteSage Gateway enables SiteSage sensor data to be uploaded wirelessly to the cloud via Ethernet, WiFi, Modbus, or Z-Wave protocols. The SiteSage Gateway supports TCP-IP via Ethernet (802.3) 10/100base-T, proxy servers and SSL encryption, DCP or static IP configurations, 802.11 b/g, WEP/WPA-2 wireless security,802.15.4 (2.4 GHz) communications with the SiteSage Energy Monitor and Controller, Mpdbus connection with the SiteSage Controller, and Z-Wave (900 MHz) with the optional USNAP module.Physical connections include: - 10/100 RJ-45 Ethernet Port - High Speed RJ-14 Serial Port - One-Wire Input; 3 Digital I/O - USNAP 2.0 Modular ConnectorA 5 VDC-AC Adapter is supplied. Dimensions are 5.25"L x 3.25"H x 1.5"W, and weight is 6oz.
